subject: Re: FW: Advantage Quote Platform on Ipad - Field not working
preview: Hi All, We have combined the best of both worlds so everyone is accommodated:On the desktop version of the site, it functions as normal. On the iPad version of the site, instead of the hand icon, yo

full_threads.body:
Hi All, 

We have combined the best of both worlds so everyone is accommodated:

  • On the desktop version of the site, it functions as normal. 
  • On the iPad version of the site, instead of the hand icon, you will now see the up and down arrows. 
If you are still having problems, please clear your browser cache and try again. Let us know how it goes?

Hello Joel, I will need to use it on ipad so please advise if this can be resolved?

with thanks,

Kind Regards,

Vanessa Laman

Senior Stylist

Advantage Property Styling

Hi Jasmine, 

I can't see Mark's message? Can you please resend?

Hi Heath,

Marc is now having issues, please see below.

Hi Jasmine and Vanessa, 

The bug is coming from the re-order button on each of the rooms. We turned off this ability for now so that you can enter text into the fields. 

We will see if Apple release a work around so that we can reinstate the re-order functionality. In the meantime, we will also try and find an alternate fix. 

In short, you will now be fine to use the proposal platform on the iPad.

Hi Jasmine, 

We are working on this as we speak as we have been able to replicate the issue. I'll have an update for you shortly.

Hi Team,

Can you please get back to Vanessa, She can't seem to edit anything eg Room Name, change the qty, measurements, stylist notes etc

-----Original Message-----
From: Vanessa Laman <vanessal@advantagestyling.com.au>
Sent: Wednesday, 7 April 2021 6:30 AM
To: info@lanter.com.au
Cc: Jasmine Killey <jasmine@advantagestyling.com.au>
Subject: Advantage Quote Platform on Ipad - Field not working

Good morning Support Desk, I am experiencing an issue when trying to create quotes on our Platform where it won’t allow me to edit and type in the “Room Name”. It just highlights in red and can’t be edited and won’t allow me to then add any subsequent rooms/inventory.

Has anyone else ever encountered this issue from an iPad when creating quotes?

Please contact me to resolve this issue as I need to use the Platform regularly throughout each workday.

With thanks
Vanessa
